name: Little Knights (Boriluk Bakaew)
description:
story

This is the story of a little knight who goes on an adventure across the land. until he found a dungeon ruled by Barbarian King The little knight must go through all the obstacles to reach the king's room. But the options are plentiful. You have to lead the little knight in the right direction.

how to play 

A-D or W-S is character movement (left, right, front, back). 

Left click to slash. Killing enemies will drop health points.          

The game has a total of 8 endings, you have to collect them all.

All ending spoilers 

1. (Geme Over) Defeat enemies and bosses. 

2. (Victory) Defeat the boss 

3. (Cowardly Knight) At the start of the game walk out of the dungeon 

4. (Surrender Knight) Surrender to the boss and walk out the door. 

5. (Stupid Knight) Fall off the floor 

6. (Greedy Knight) Find the secret room and select door number 1 

7. (Killer Trap) Find the secret room and select door number 2. 

8. (Fountain Holy) Find the secret room and select door number 3.

Please help us by rating this game. Tell us what you think!
